title: In ‘Tulsa King,’ Sylvester Stallone Tries Something New: Being Himself
description: His best-known characters often speak in grunts. But in a new series from Taylor Sheridan, he plays a smooth talker written with his real personality in mind.
dc:creator: Austin Considine
media:credit: Sinna Nasseri for The New York Times
media:description: “I would say at my age, right now, I’m probably doing my best work because I’m actually playing me,” Stallone said.
